entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 36 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
